trans-unit.source: Provides run-time access to the routing service to allow dynamic modification of the routing configuration.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso de tempo de execução para o serviço de roteamento para permitir a modificação dinâmica da configuração de roteamento.

trans-unit.source: Applies a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration"></xref> to a running instance of the routing service.
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se um novo <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration"> </xref> para executar uma instância do serviço de roteamento.

trans-unit.source: After calling ApplyConfiguration, the new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration> only applies to new sessions and messages.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar ApplyConfiguration, o novo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>se aplica somente a novas sessões e mensagens.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: > [!WARNING] > Do not modify the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration> object after calling ApplyConfiguration, as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration> does not provide thread-safe updates or extensions.
trans-unit.target: > [!WARNING] > Não modifique o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>objeto depois de chamar ApplyConfiguration, como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>não fornece atualizações do thread-safe ou extensões.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: > > If you must perform subsequent updates of the routing configuration, use a new instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration> for each update.
trans-unit.target: >> Se for necessário executar atualizações subsequentes da configuração de roteamento, use uma nova instância de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>para cada atualização.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Routing.RoutingConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: The routing configuration to be applied.
trans-unit.target: A configuração de roteamento a ser aplicado.
